title: Kaoma - Best (Disco Collection) (2002) APE
description: Kaoma - Best (Disco Collection) (2002) APE Kaoma is a French-Brazilian pop group made up of former members of the band Touré Kunda: Chyco Dru (bassist), Jacky Arconte (guitarist), Jean-Claude Bonaventure (producer and keyboardist), Michel Abihssira (drums and percussion), Fania (vocals), and Loalwa Braz (lead singer), Chico and Roberta (dancers). Chyco Dru is from Martinique, Jacky Arconte from Guadeloupe, and Loalwa Braz from Brazil. In 1989, they had a major chart-topping hit with their dance music single "Lambada", a translation of "Llorando se fue", which gave rise to the Lambada dance craze. Country: Russia Genre: Latino / Pop Year of manufacture: 2002 Label: Warner Bros. Records Format: APE (image + CUE) Duration: 75.40 Tracklist: 01. Lambada [0:03:28.65] 02.
